story.iWant: a comprehensive README.md that explains the library's purpose, features, and quick start
story.soThat: users can quickly understand and adopt the library
story.tasks: - Write library overview and key features section - Add installation instructions (npm install @loqalabs/loqa-audio-dsp) - Create quick start examples for computeFFT, detectPitch, extractFormants, analyzeSpectrum - Add prerequisites (React Native, Expo SDK version, iOS/Android requirements) - Link to API.md and INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md - Add badges (npm version, license, build status)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: AC1: Given package complete, When writing README, Then includes purpose, key features (FFT, pitch, formants, spectral), installation, and quick start AC2: Given README created, When checking examples, Then shows code snippets for all four DSP functions AC3: Given content complete, When reviewing, Then includes API overview, platform support, prerequisites, and links to detailed docs

doc.title: PRD - Documentation Requirements
doc.snippet: README: library purpose, installation, quick start with all four DSP functions. Link to API.md and INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md. Badges and platform support.

story-context.constraints: - Professional, concise writing style - Code examples must be runnable and accurate - Installation: npm install @loqalabs/loqa-audio-dsp - Quick start examples for all four functions: computeFFT, detectPitch, extractFormants, analyzeSpectrum - Prerequisites: Expo SDK ≥49, React Native ≥0.72, iOS ≥13, Android ≥21 - Include badges: npm version, license (MIT), build status - Link to docs/API.md and docs/INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md - Professional README sections: Features, Installation, Quick Start, Documentation, Platform Support, License - Completes Epic 5 documentation foundation

tests.standards: Verify code examples are syntactically correct. Test installation instructions. Verify links to other docs work. Validate badges display correctly.
tests.locations: Manual testing - verify README renders correctly on GitHub and npm
tests.ideas: - Copy/paste quick start examples into fresh project, verify they work (AC2) - Verify all four DSP functions have examples (AC2) - Check prerequisites section complete (AC3) - Verify links to API.md and INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md resolve (AC3) - Test npm badge link works (AC3)
